extension_description.message: Adds SteamDB links and new features on the Steam store and community. View lowest game prices and stats.

steamstatus_downtime.message: Steam appears to be experiencing some downtime.

explore_auto_discover_description.message: Automatically discover the queue to get an event card.

explore_generating.message: Generating new discovery queue, this can fail if Steam is under high load…

explore_failed_to_clear.message: Failed to clear queue item #$1. Will try again soon.

explore_failed_to_generate.message: Failed to generate new queue, trying again in five seconds…

hidden_achievement_hover.message: Hidden achievement, mouse over to reveal:

hidden_achievement_but_loaded.message: (but SteamDB extension was able to load your achievements)
